footerSection.title: How does Pomanda value a Business?
footerSection.subpara: Pomanda Plus subscribers can view 'Estimated Valuations' for any company on their profile page.

cardSection.title: Relative Valuation
cardSection.description: At Pomanda our focus is on Relative Valuation, where the value of a company is based on the price of similar companies i.e. public traded companies in the same or related industries.

cardSection.title: Valuation Calculator
cardSection.description: Using publicly traded companies ensures that each industry multiple is calculated from a sizeable, recognised and measurable dataset.

cardSection.title: Bespoke Multiples
cardSection.description: We calculate monthly multiples for every industry, then we adjust for several factors (such as gross margin and Illiquidity) to create a bespoke Pomanda multiple for every company that we value.
